summary.title: RMS Software
summary.description: A new Retail Management System (RMS) for their store that will interoperate with a new online shop. Stillgood would like to invest in an electronic point-of-sale system for the charity shop that incorporates sales and stock control capabilities.

threats.title: Authentication Abuse
threats.description:
CAPEC-114: Exploiting weak authentication mechanisms or using insider knowledge to gain unauthorized access to sensitive customer and volunteer data.

Properties: Security, Confidentiality, and Integrity. 
Value: High
Rationale: This threat is critical since threat actors can gain unauthorized access, perform lateral movement, and perform malicious actions within the RMS system depending on the intended goal.
threats.mitigation:
•	Implement periodic access reviews and audits.
•	Enforce strong password policies.
•	Monitor and log access attempts, triggering alerts for suspicious activities.
•	Setting up conditional access policies.
•	Setting up attribute-based access controls (ABAC) and role based access controls (RBAC).

text.text:
Generation of sales 
and donation reports
